What? What? Did someone say Kids Foot Locker has a new loyalty program called FLX? We sure do! Update your app today to move to the FLX program, take advantage of the new benefits, earn XPoints and redeem them for fly rewards. Earn rewards at all of our stores, websites and apps! All this because we love you.

We're offering more ways to pay with our new Kids Foot Locker update! Choose Apple Pay for your next purchase for a quick and easy checkout. Users can comfortably search their local store's inventory, buy online, and pick up in-store as a safe, fast, and simple way to get the hottest new looks.
